data.message: All of you Trump supporters are either super slow or just plain stupid. "..oh he just lost a fan.." haahah you idiots- he just told you all to fuck off if you support the orange bag of dicks. You can't unlike him if he just told you to kick rocks! Just like your idol- Steph Curry told him he ain't going then he uninvites them to the WH haahahah

replies.message: You obviously never heard of anything called “facts,history or Logic”🤔
So then you are saying that half of the country is dumb and you must be one of the smart ones. Don’t be butt hurt that things didn’t go your way that happens sometimes in life it will be ok.
He just told our money to fuck off as well.
Phuck U Eminem! Your career was going nowhere and now it  will go there faster!

I get the feel old Evan and Navy think buying a album means the artist must never ever have opinions. I've seen this a lot on Stephen King's page a people telling him to shut up and write makes me laugh.
All these rappers praised Donald Trump ..https://youtu.be/-WhGgHjwZxU
